item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Thursday, April 24, 2025 at 9:20 AM UTC
item.description:

2. Show HN: My from-scratch OS kernel that runs DOOM (194 points | 42 comments)
3. How a 20 year old bug in GTA San Andreas surfaced in Windows 11 24H2 (1113 points | 252 comments)

7. Teaching LLMs how to solid model (249 points | 85 comments)

13. The hidden cost of AI coding (99 points | 148 comments)
14. First Successful Lightning Triggering and Guiding Using a Drone (118 points | 53 comments)

26. DOGE worker’s code supports NLRB whistleblower (833 points | 441 comments)
27. C++26: more constexpr in the core language (87 points | 63 comments)
28. Beer on Board in the Age of Sail (2017) (52 points | 52 comments)
29. Get your Minitel back, the COMPUTEL videotex BBS is back (48 points | 5 comments)
